detail_desc: Short jacket in mesh with large sequins, long sleeves and no buttons. Jersey lining.
Glittery hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with an elasticated waist and laser-cut hem. Lined.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nursing top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, short sleeves and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Imitation leather sandals with metal buckles, moulded rubber insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with an embroidered text motif on the brim. Width of brim approx. 14.5 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and on the double-layered sleeves.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a scuba fabric front. Zip at the front, wide crossover shoulder straps and mesh sides.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in a soft cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, and side pockets.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with frill-trimmed, elasticated shoulder straps and a wrapover front with flounces at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounced trim at the hem. Unlined.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round metal pendant. Adjustable length, 40-46 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist, and side pockets.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Long-sleeved dress in soft denim with buttons at the top, a chest pocket, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Patterned jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and patterned soles.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, detachable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Chest pocket, back pockets and fake front pockets.
Metal hair grips. Two plain, one with rhinestones, one with plastic beads and one with a shimmering pearly plastic bead. Length from 5 cm to 6 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in nylon with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 24.5 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Short shorts in a linen and cotton weave with pleats at the top. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and a detachable tie belt.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked bodice and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows at the top. Gathered tier to create volume and movement in the skirt. Unlined.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a grandad collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Wide top in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and hemstitch and a frill trim at the hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Short skirt in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a lace trim at the neckline.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt and concealed side pockets. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, knee-length dresses in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle with a motif on the front. Width approx. 3 cm.
Fitted top in rib jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a wide neckline that is low-cut at the back.
Polo shirt in striped cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, sewn-on tie belt, elastication at the back and pleats at the top. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.
Hat in paper straw with a lace ribbon around the brim. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed slightly stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Top in narrow-ribbed jersey with a soft, deep V-neck front and back, short sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked edge at the hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Belt in imitation leather with eyelets and a buckle in metal. Width 2.5 cm.

Wide, off-the shoulder top in soft slub jersey with inset lace trims at the front and on the sleeves. Elastication and a short frill trim at the top, long, slightly wider sleeves with pin-tucks, and elasticated cuffs with a frill trim.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 2-3Y). Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Running trousers in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Side pockets with a taped zip, concealed back pockets, elasticated hems and reflective details. Regular fit.
T-shirt in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges at the sleeves and hem.
V-neck peplum top in jersey crêpe with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, shaped cups, side support, a concealed zip at the side and a seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined at the top.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, sewn-in creases down the legs and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Long top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Long, wide sleeves with gathered seams, and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Cold shoulder top in a crinkled weave with embroidery at the front. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a scalloped, crocheted trim at the top and short flounced sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 18M-4Y).
Earrings in textured metal. Length 6 cm.
Top in soft, brushed jersey with a small stand-up collar, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with short sleeves and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative tie detail at the front and narrow elastication at the hem.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim at the top, sleeve-ends and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder.
Fully lined bikini in a textured-knit finish. Top with narrow, double, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the bikini is partly recycled.
